subject: Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Troy Brown, who held the Patriots’ single-season reception record that was surpassed this season by Wes Welker, ran routes for the scout team to help prepare the Patriots’ defense for the Super Bowl.
snippet: Troy Brown, who held the Patriots’ single-season reception record that was surpassed this season by Wes Welker, ran routes for the scout team to help prepare the Patriots’ defense for the Super Bowl.
